Job Posting: 178038 - Position: S26 Internship - Simulations and planning for the QEYSSat mission 178038 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 02/15/2026 11:59 PM Through Employer Website 02/04/2026 02:08 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Canadian Space Agency Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2026 - Summer S26 Internship - Simulations and planning for the QEYSSat mission 178038 Co-op Position Longueuil, QC Canada 4 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description Salary Not Available, 0 Major List The Canadian Space Agency (CSAQEYSSatQKD) in space. This internship will involve working with a team of engineers and scientists from the CSA to support the development of the ground operation procedures for the upcoming QEYSSat mission. The intern will run simulations of quantum key distribution to identify potential factors impacting the key generation performance. The intern will also contribute to the development of procedures and documents for planning and tracking use of the satellite and optical quantum ground station. Job Requirements • • Requirements: Experience in quantum mechanics. • Experience with a programming language. • Ability to perform rigorous and autonomous work. • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills • Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. • Working proficiency in English. • Currently enrolled in a relevant undergraduate program (at 3rd year level or higher) or a relevant graduate program, in physics, engineering physics, computer science, or other related program. • Experience/knowledge of quantum key distribution protocols. • Experience/knowledge of optical systems and communication technologies. Experience in MATLAB, Python, C, C#, or similar programming language. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://www.asc-csa.gc.ca/eng/jobs/search-internships.asp Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
